dialogue.line: brah
i walked all the way here
just for this??
nah man i'm sure i need to find another house to break in this shit's stupid
brah who the hell are you
you don't know me??
i'm baxter, world famous rapper and home invader
now can you leave me alone... i need to break in... for the funny
no bro
that's MY house... me... betpo's house... i only let people in when i want to
and i Don't want you To
you're LAMEEE
kill yourself bruj
Don't Fucking. say that...
You do Not realize who you're Messing with ...
see... even my baby agrees...
she doesn't talk but she still agrees with me right.....
..so pleaseee let me in
can youshut The up man i ain't giving you all that
okok how about this:
a rap battle.
dude
yes sir . a rap battle. if i win you let me in ok? Ok
i'm only gonna agree just so that you shut up about all of this. you are an annoying fuck
i despise you with all my being and i pray on your downfall
what kinda crash out is ts :joy::joy::joy::joy::100::fire:
nah man
that's just not it my man
here, i'll show you real bars, just watch:
